title: Fenêtre Capture Tool
description:
The Fenêtre Capture Tool offers extensive possibilities for making professional screenshots and screen recordings. It is the most functional and user-friendly free capture tool on the market.

Perfect for use at the office or at home:
Connect with Microsoft Teams to easily share captures.
Use the blur and pixelate options to remove sensitive information.
Record your screen with audio.
Use the arrow with text and numbered steps to quickly create clear instuctions in one screenshot.
